articles.author: Faizan Haidar and Kailash Babar
articles.title: Toppr.com founder Zishaan Hayath buys property in Bandra for Rs 41 crore - Economic Times
articles.description: The luxurious real estate project has a total super-built-up area of more than 50,000 sq ft, consisting of a basement, ground floor, and six podium parking spaces. There are eight habitable floors in the project out of a total of 15.
articles.content: Zishaan Hayath, founder of Toppr.com which was last year acquired by edtech firm Byju's, has bought a 4,000-sq-ft sea-facing apartment in a project of developer Rustomjee at Bandra in Mumbai for 41 c… [+1710 chars]

articles.title: Twitter Q2 Earnings 2022 Review : losses jump, falling ad-business growth - INDmoney
articles.description: Twitter Q2 Earnings were full of surprise. It reported another set of quarterly losses. Twitter didn't give any business growth guidance for the future due to the ongoing court case over Musk's takeover deal.

articles.title: Rumour: Kia Seltos to get 6 airbags across all variants - Team-BHP
articles.description: The Kia Seltos is likely to get some updates later this year, including 6 airbags across all variants. The updated Seltos could start arriving at dealerships by August 2022. The revised equipment list is said to affect the car’s pricing as well.

articles.title: Explained: Why China's crumbling real estate sector has the world on edge - Economic Times
articles.description: Across China, real estate developers are getting desperate - attempting to sell homes by whatever means possible, even going as far as accepting down-payments in wheat, garlic, watermelons and peaches to cater to farmers.
